percentageThreshold.name: Percentage Threshold
percentageThreshold.description: Threshold (in percent) necessary to show Mr. Jim M. Boree

image.name: Image
image.description:
The image you want to show (in case you dislike Mr. Jim M. Boree, for whatever reason).

<c-ffffff>JPG/JPEG files are not allowed.</c>

moveForDuration.name: Move for... (seconds)
moveForDuration.description: Duration of the Mr. Jim M. Boree animation. <cy>Does not affect playback speed of optional SFX.</c>

startMovingFrom.name: Start Moving From...
startMovingFrom.description: The side of the screen you want the image to start moving from.

holdForDuration.name: Hold for... (seconds)
holdForDuration.description: How long Mr. Jim M. Boree should be on screen before fading away. <cy>Does not affect playback speed of optional SFX.</c>

returnToDuration.name: Move away for... (seconds)
returnToDuration.description: How long Mr. Jim M. Boree should be on screen before fading away. <cy>Does not affect playback speed of optional SFX.</c>

sfx.name: SFX
sfx.description: The SFX you want to play in addition to the image (in case you want it, for whatever reason).

volume.name: SFX Volume (%)
volume.description: The volume of the SFX, if you've selected one already.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
